name: Pocket Rocket - Hyper
description:
Pocket Rocket-Hyper is an addicting game where you keep going up while dodging the many obstacles that come your way.

Be wary space cadet; your tap will determine the fate of the rocket - and potentially your high score.
The only way to control the swinging rocket is to carefully time your tap when the rocket faces the direction you want it to go in.

As you fly up, remember to collect the ‘orbs’ which will form a shield and protect you from anything that might destroy the rocket.

For those few seconds, you will also get a speed boost to help you blast past any obstacle that is in your way.

Endless and unlimited entertainment!
